channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20829] JdbcStorageHandler range split throws NPE
item.description:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I cannot add a .q test, as it only happens on non-local mode. However, test with MiniCluster will result a "Derby may have already booted" issue.

-1 overall
